Detailed Description

template<typename Type, int len>
class RODOS::Fifo< Type, len >

simple FIFO (realized as ring buffer)

A fifo where both sides (reader & writer) can work asynchronously. If one side has more than one owner, the fifo has to be protected using priority_ceiling, or semaphores.

Parameters:
Typedata type of fifo entries
lenmaximal number of entries must be at least 2
